summary: A simple main menu music replacer that changes the main menu "Dovahkiin" song to various other songs, including several works from Malukah and several metal songs.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b]Short Description[/b][/size]

A simple main menu music replacer that changes the main menu "Dovahkiin" song to various other songs, including several works from Malukah and several metal songs.

[size=5][b]Songs[/b][/size]

- Malukah's "Fear Not This Night"
- Orchestral remix of Malukah's "Dragonborn Comes"
- "Trogdor the Burninator" brought to you by Strong Bad from Homestar Runner
- Brandon Strader's "Sons of Skyrim Epic Metal Remix"

[size=2][b]If you want your own music replacer using different music ask me in the comments. I will almost certainly make it for you within a day![/b][/size]

[size=5][b]Check out my other mods:[/b][/size]

- Equipping Overhaul: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49784]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49784[/url]
"Equipping Overhaul is a complete overhaul on Skyrim's system of swapping, equipping, and dropping items."

- Ultimate Immersive Classes: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48570]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48570[/url]
"Ultimate Immersive Classes" provides a choice of class and subsequent class loadout in the start of the game."

- Death Souls: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49294]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49294[/url]
"Death Souls adds a costly method to avoid death that is unique to Dovahkiin."

- Ranger Elite Work in Progress: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Fqst0ny5bY]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Fqst0ny5bY[/url]
"Featuring dual arrows, cone arrow firing, hail of arrows. Be Legolas!"

- Courier Between Worlds Work in Progress
"Send messages via the in game courier to your friends in other worlds."

- Classes of Winterhold Work in Progress
"Attend classes and lessons at the college of Winterhold, and later teach them for experience and income. Also featuring College of Winterhold quest line extension."

- Weapon Degradation and Repair Work in Progress
"Weapons will degrade as you use them, like an inverse to improving items as a grindstone. Grindstones and whetstones can be used to get your items good as new, or give them to a smith to do it for you. Different things cause faster degradation, such as hitting enemies wearing heavy armour. Let your weapon become too degraded and it may break."

[size=5][b]Credits[/b][/size]

Bethesda for Skyrim!
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3958792]T3nd0[/url] for artwork!
- [url=http://www.malukah.com/]Malukah[/url] for Malukah song vocals!
- [url=http://www.taylordavisviolin.com/]Taylor Davis[/url] for "Fear Not This Night" song violin!
- [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/lara6683?feature=waÂ­tch]Lara[/url] for "Fear Not This Night" song piano!
- [url=http://www.homestarrunner.com/]Homestar Runner[/url] for "Trogdor the Burninator"!
- [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/bestrader?feature=watch]Brandon Strader[/url] for "Sons of Skyrim Epic Metal Remix"!
- AllThereIsToSayOnTheMatter for requesting this mod!

[center][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/images/377540]Please check this out![/url][/size][/center]
[center][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49690]And this![/url][/size][/center]
